meanings.definition: A person highly skilled in music or another artistic pursuit.
meanings.sent1: The young virtuoso played the piano beautifully at the concert.
meanings.sent2: She is known as a virtuoso violinist in the orchestra.
meanings.sent3: The virtuoso painter created a masterpiece using only his fingers.
meanings.sent4: Her skills on the guitar make her a true virtuoso in the music world.
meanings.sent5: The virtuoso dancer moved across the stage with grace and precision.

meanings.definition: A person with exceptional ability or technique in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: The chess virtuoso defeated all opponents in record time.
meanings.sent2: He is a virtuoso when it comes to solving complex math problems.
meanings.sent3: The cooking virtuoso whipped up a delicious meal in minutes.
meanings.sent4: Her virtuoso skills in negotiation always lead to successful deals.
meanings.sent5: The young virtuoso programmer developed a groundbreaking software application.
